results.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
results.short_title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
results.latest_major_action: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) the Budget, (2) Education and the Workforce, and (3) Ways and Means.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) the Budget, (2) Education and the Workforce, and (3) Ways and Means.

actions.description: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
